about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for The Take composed and arranged by Zac Zinger.

Track List:
1. The Take (01:07)
2. The Classy Uncle (02:18)
3. The Hider (04:07)
4. Gin and Squalor (02:20)
5. The Seeker (04:09)
6. Rolled-up (01:30)
7. In the Bag (01:25)
detailed_description:
The official soundtrack for The Take composed and arranged by Zac Zinger.

Track List:
1. The Take (01:07)
2. The Classy Uncle (02:18)
3. The Hider (04:07)
4. Gin and Squalor (02:20)
5. The Seeker (04:09)
6. Rolled-up (01:30)
7. In the Bag (01:25)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: : OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later.
  • Processor: Intel Mac 1.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon(TM) 9500 or better, NVIDIA GeForce(TM) FX 5900 or better, Intel GMA 950 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: The Take: Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or newer.
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD 290 equivalent or greater
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: The official soundtrack for The Take composed and arranged by Zac Zinger.
